trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] On Windows, you will also need to add the Git executable to your PATH environment variable.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] On Windows, you will also need to add the Git executable to your PATH environment variable.

trans-unit.source: Create a file named **composer.json** in the root of your project and add the following code to it:
trans-unit.target: Create a file named **composer.json** in the root of your project and add the following code to it:

trans-unit.source: Open a command prompt and execute the following command in your project root
trans-unit.target: Open a command prompt and execute the following command in your project root

trans-unit.source: To download and install the PHP Client Libraries for Azure manually, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: To download and install the PHP Client Libraries for Azure manually, follow these steps:

trans-unit.source: Download a .zip archive that contains the libraries from [GitHub][php-sdk-github].
trans-unit.target: Download a .zip archive that contains the libraries from [GitHub][php-sdk-github].

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, fork the repository and clone it to your local machine.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, fork the repository and clone it to your local machine.

trans-unit.source: The latter option requires a GitHub account and having Git installed locally.
trans-unit.target: The latter option requires a GitHub account and having Git installed locally.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The PHP Client Libraries for Azure have a dependency on the [HTTP_Request2](http://pear.php.net/package/HTTP_Request2), [Mail_mime](http://pear.php.net/package/Mail_mime), and [Mail_mimeDecode](http://pear.php.net/package/Mail_mimeDecode) PEAR packages.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The PHP Client Libraries for Azure have a dependency on the [HTTP_Request2](http://pear.php.net/package/HTTP_Request2), [Mail_mime](http://pear.php.net/package/Mail_mime), and [Mail_mimeDecode](http://pear.php.net/package/Mail_mimeDecode) PEAR packages.

trans-unit.source: The recommended way to resolve these dependencies is to install these packages using the [PEAR package manager](http://pear.php.net/manual/en/installation.php).
trans-unit.target: The recommended way to resolve these dependencies is to install these packages using the [PEAR package manager](http://pear.php.net/manual/en/installation.php).

trans-unit.source: Copy the `WindowsAzure` directory of the downloaded archive to your application directory structure.
trans-unit.target: Copy the `WindowsAzure` directory of the downloaded archive to your application directory structure.

trans-unit.source: For more information about installing the PHP Client Libraries for Azure (including information about installing as a PEAR package), see [Download the Azure SDK for PHP][download-SDK-PHP].
trans-unit.target: For more information about installing the PHP Client Libraries for Azure (including information about installing as a PEAR package), see [Download the Azure SDK for PHP][download-SDK-PHP].
